author: Suha Ma’ayeh
title: Pompeo Backs Israel’s Right to Defend Border With Gaza
text:
AMMAN—U.S. Secretary of State Mike Pompeo Monday said Israel has the right to defend itself after a month of deadly clashes at the fence dividing the country and the Gaza Strip, calling on both sides to resume political engagement.
President Donald Trump’s chief diplomat was concluding his first-ever international trip after being sworn in on Thursday. He landed in Amman on Sunday after stops in Brussels, Riyadh and Tel Aviv.
